item.title: A deeper look at AI crawlers: breaking down traffic by purpose and industry
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
üåê Cloudflare Radar is enhancing AI insights with new industry-focused data on bot traffic. The article discusses how traditional search platforms are affected by the rise of AI. Users often find answers without clicking through to original sources, impacting ad revenue for publishers. New features include a breakdown of AI bot traffic by purpose, such as training and user action, allowing for better understanding of these trends. üìäü§ñ #AIBotTraffic #CloudflareRadar #DigitalMarketing‚Ä¶

item.title: Uninterrupted Motion: Why Factories Need a New Class of Wireless
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
Factories are increasingly using Automated Guided Vehicles (AGVs) and Autonomous Mobile Robots (AMRs) to boost productivity. These vehicles rely on robust wireless networks to operate effectively. üìàü§ñ A reliable connection is vital for real-time inspections and safety alerts. Any interruption can lead to missed defects or safety risks, potentially halting production. üõë‚ö†Ô∏è Companies like BMW and Samsung are already utilizing these technologies to enhance quality assurance and operational safety‚Ä¶.

Source: Cisco Developer Blog
Author: Patricia Costa
Category: industry_analysis

item.title: The business impact of Elasticsearch logsdb index mode and TSDS
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
üöÄ The Elasticsearch team has rolled out enhancements in versions 8.19 and 9.1, focusing on storage efficiency and performance. üìä Key features include the logsdb index mode and time series data streams (TSDS), which address challenges faced by DevOps and security teams. üìà Benchmark results show a storage efficiency improvement of ~16% and an indexing throughput boost of ~19%. For users not yet on logsdb, storage reductions could exceed 70%. üîç Remember, logsdb is available for both Basic and‚Ä¶

Source: Elastic Blog
Author: Tim Brophy
Category: industry_analysis

item.title: How Industry Collaboration Fosters NVIDIA Co-Packaged Optics
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
NVIDIA is transforming data-center connectivity by merging optical and electrical components through strong industry partnerships. ü§ù Their networking platform integrates advanced technologies from top partners, focusing on scalable and efficient optical systems. Key innovations include the Micro Ring Modulator, allowing high data throughput with a compact design. Collaboration with TSMC has addressed manufacturing challenges, ensuring reliable performance essential for modern data centers‚Ä¶.

Source: Nvidia Developer Blog
Author: Ashkan Seyedi
Category: industry_analysis

item.title: AWS services scale to new heights for Prime Day 2025: key metrics and milestones
item.dc:creator: Micha≈Ç Rutkowski
item.description:
üöÄ Amazon Prime Day 2025 set new sales records, driven by enhanced AI features and AWS infrastructure. Prime members enjoyed billions in savings, utilizing tools like Alexa+ and AI Shopping Guides for a seamless shopping experience. Key AWS metrics include 1.7 trillion Lambda invocations and a 160% increase in robot commands, showcasing massive scalability. #AmazonPrimeDay #AWS #AIShopping #Ecommerce #TechInnovation

Source: AWS Blog
